instructions: Download the PhotoSafe Fullscreen Immersive app from the Google Play Store . Similar paid apps, like Immersive Mode Manager , are available for free with Google Play Pass . Launch the app and tap I Agree . Tap the Off toggle in the top-right corner to turn it On . Tap Grant . Tap the Allow permission toggle, then tap back . Tap Hide Nothing , Hide Navigation Bar , or Hide Navigation and Status Bar . These settings will apply to all apps and take effect immediately.

Launch the PhotoSafe Fullscreen Immersive app and tap Usage Access . Tap Grant . Tap Full Screen Immersive Mode . Tap Allow usage tracking , then tap back twice. All of your apps will appear in the bottom part of the screen. Tap the magnifying glass to search your apps. Enter the name of the app. If using the free version, you may have to tap Hide Nothing at the top of the app for the keyboard to appear. Tap the app to set your preferences:
